entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
